MergeResults.query: SELECT creg."SOMProductId", creg."Name", creg."UniqueIntegrationId", creg."EffectiveDate", creg."EndDate", creg."Status", creg."SOMRegionId" FROM STATIC."OMProduct" creg WHERE creg."UniqueIntegrationId" ILIKE '%OMR-13631%' ORDER BY creg."UniqueIntegrationId"
